snippet.title: Sid Meier's Civilization V: Brave New World Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Expand your civilization in new ways through the introduction of international trade, and a stronger focus on culture and diplomacy. The all-new expansion to Civilization V also introduces new civilizations, wonders, Great Works, scenarios and more. The dawn of a Brave New World is upon us. How will you build your empire?

The Brave New World expansion pack launches July 9, 2013 in North America and July 12, 2012 internationally.
